text: Pedro Gomez (August 20, 1962 â€“ February 7, 2021) was an American sports journalist. He worked as a reporter for ESPN from 2003 to 2021. He appeared on the SportsCenter show. He was primarily a baseball reporter. He was also a member of the Baseball Writers' Association of America. He covered 25 World Series and 22 Major League Baseball All-Star Games.
